attributes.additional_details: Recognise those that are at the frontline even though they will be worried, stressed and anxious themselves but are still continuing to make sure everyone else can be provided with what they need through this uncertain period.
attributes.background: Recognise keyworkers through the Covid-19 period who are working extremely hard to provide a continuous service throughout this hard time

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
